history.proof: intros P H p. induction p. - apply Zrec2. auto. - apply Zrec3. auto. apply IHp.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall P : Z -> Set, (forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n) -> forall p : nat, and_recZ p P

Premises:
lt_absZ = fun x y : Z => ltZ (absZ x) (absZ y) : Z -> Z -> Prop
and_recZ = fun (p : nat) (P : Z -> Set) => forall n : nat, n <= p -> and_set_set_set (P (pos n)) (P (neg n)) : nat -> (Z -> Set) -> Set Arguments and_recZ _%nat_scope _%function_scope
Inductive Z : Set := OZ : Z | pos : nat -> Z | neg : nat -> Z Arguments pos _%nat_scope Arguments neg _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Zrec3 : forall (P : Z -> Set) (p : nat), (forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n) -> and_recZ p P -> and_recZ (S p) P
Zrec2 : forall P : Z -> Set, (forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n) -> and_recZ 0 P
Zrec1 : forall P : Z -> Set, (forall n : Z, (forall m : Z, lt_absZ m n -> P m) -> P n) -> P OZ
Z_rec : forall P : Z -> Set, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_sind : forall P : Z -> SProp, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_rect : forall P : Z -> Type, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_ind : forall P : Z -> Prop, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
sumbool_rec : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
between_sind : forall (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P0 : nat -> SProp), P0 k -> (forall l : nat, between P k l -> P0 l -> P l -> P0 (S l)) -> forall n : nat, between P k n -> P0 n
and_set_set_set_rec : forall (S1 S2 : Set) (P : and_set_set_set S1 S2 -> Set), (forall (s : S2) (s0 : S1), P (and_set_set_set_i S1 S2 s s0)) -> forall a : and_set_set_set S1 S2, P a
Inductive between (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) : nat -> Prop := bet_emp : between P k k | bet_S : forall l : nat, between P k l -> P l -> between P k (S l) Arguments between _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments bet_emp _%function_scope _%nat_scope Arguments bet_S _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.min_le_compat_l : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> Nat.min p n <= Nat.min p m
Nat.sub_le_mono_l : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> p - m <= p - n
le_plus_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> n <= m + p
Nat.central_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
tech_lt_abs_OZ : forall x : Z, lt_absZ x (pos 0) -> x = OZ
Init.Nat.add = fix add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S p => S (add p m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.add (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.lnot_spec_low : forall a n m : nat, m < n -> Nat.testbit (Nat.lnot a n) m = negb (Nat.testbit a m)
Field_theory.AFdiv_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q))
Nat.min_assoc : forall m n p : nat, Nat.min m (Nat.min n p) = Nat.min (Nat.min m n) p
beq_nat_eq : forall n m : nat, true = (n =? m) -> n = m
Field_theory.AFinv_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI
minus_n_Sm : forall n m : nat, m < n -> Init.Nat.pred (n - m) = n - S m
Record almost_field_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_afield { AF_AR : almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req; AF_1_neq_0 : ~ req rI rO; AFdiv_def : forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q)); AFinv_l : forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI } Arguments Field_theory.almost_field_theory [R]%type_scope _ _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments Field_theory.mk_afield [R]%type_scope [rO rI] [radd rmul rsub ropp]%function_scope (_ _)%...

```coq
intros P H p.
induction p.
- apply Zrec2. assumption.
- apply Zrec3. assumption. apply IHp.
Qed.
```

original: intros P H p. induction p. - apply Zrec2. auto. - apply Zrec3. auto. apply IHp.
